1.content:
in the year 2239 technology has reached the point to where people can now transfer their consciousness into a new body with all of their memories in tact.so long as they have a special chip implanted with in their brains, have a special bracelet that acts as a beacon signal for the system to spawn a new body and have their re-berth insurance pay up( a system in which the user pays the HEAVILY government-regulated companies to keep their DNA on file for respawning, if policy holder lapses on payment then the system stops functioning for them) humankind has since then lost all fear and set off with even greater boldness to seek new and grander trills. from insane stunts, to exploration of the cosmos. humankind has abundantly filled the universe seeing as earth was heavily over populated due to humans rarely dying.

in humanity's explorations they happen to come upon many strange discoveries; such as the means to splice humans with designer DNA making it possible to create half man half animal hybrids or half plant people. the other major discovery was the finding of a unique flora that caused a strange reaction in any species females who breathed in the pollen from it. the pollen caused females to have increased flexibility, strength, metabolism, hunger, and lustful desires; this flora was found upon a planet populated only by women as all of the men had mysteriously vanished, thus the flora was called the "amazoness blossom" for the benefits it gave. the blossom was a big hit among the sex industry even with the side affect the pollen had.

the women who use it, became extremely hungry enough to need quantily of foods in amount either equal or double their own body weight but would always retain their original weight. soon it was discovered that the women could even swallow items big than their selves whole in a single gulp. their bodies could stretch to accommodate what ever they place with in it, thous giving birth to a whole new field of fetish viewing was founded; Vore Porn. the craze hit the universe hard, with the countless demands there came a extreme shortage to met it and movie companies gave there all to meet it. but due to the canyon size demands for the fetish, many groups tried their hand at controlling the new big craze, to be at the very top of the game.

but to for you, it doesn't matter (right?) you just want to leave your great mark in history of showbiz. question is what path will you take?
1.title: it began in 2239

info.brief_description: a new craze has hit universe; watch the rise of the age of Vore movies
info.description:
humanking has reached a new peak, as new technology has shifted the very course of the universe. and in this shift came new discoveries and pleasures. thus the rises of Vorenogerphy began,and the demand for it was so great, that the business was now taking all it could even you. the field is wide out, looking for someone to take the lead and be the next big hit of showbiz.
Your goal is to succeed in your field all while surviving your job,coworkers,bosses, critics, and etc. craft either a single scene for a film r write an entire film

Rules

all forms of vore are allowed thou please keep the CV down as much as you can unless dealing with futa charaters

please no male on male scenes, any M/M will be taken down

Scat, toilet scenes, and watersports are allow. and Scat is most definely welcome here

F/f F/m F/multi h/f h/m 3somes, or other are allowed

vore MUST be included, thou the chapter can just be softcore or just straight vore with out erotic tones, i would prefer if it was a mixture of both.

full tours or full digestion is recommended as well a disposal

stories can either be in real life or in a anime/manga form, thou please use only humaniod characters please

I would prefer Only to see the females doing the vore,

characters can survive their trip if you wish

and remember to just have fun with it
